section.section: The Commission shall establish advisory boards to assist the Commission in carrying out its powers and duties under this subtitle.

The Commission may establish advisory boards on adult:
detention centers and lockups;
community correctional facilities; and
correctional facilities other than those listed in items (i) and (ii) of this paragraph.

text.section: The chairperson of the Commission shall appoint the members of an advisory board with the approval of the Commission.
The chairperson of an advisory board shall be a Commission member.
